> Email tricket@... and tell him how lame Gladiator is. (don't
really, Tom might get > mad)

Um... Tom probably got the message, as he is a moderator on the list.

If we get more messages tonight and tomorrow, January 2001 will have the
most messages of any month since the list started in September 1998.  Just a
little statistic I thought you all might like to know.  I, personally, think
it's amazing that there are so many messages going through the list,
considering there are less than 70 subscribers and Gladiator is a relatively
old game that hasn't had any recent developments.  Congrats, Tom & Forgotten
Sages team.
